website_summaries.verdict: Stands at the top of the pack for having numerous qualities users need in a hairbrush or comb – versatility, well-made construction, and no-tangle bristles.
pros: It garners praise not only for its versatility but also for detangling without damaging hair
It feels sturdy and can be used on wet or dry hair and short to long lengths
cons: The design is unique and some first-time users are surprised by how it feels in their hand versus other products

customer_reviews.title: Single dad can't do hair
customer_reviews.text: I'm a single dad of a 6 years old girl and combing her hair is the hardest part of taking care of her. She gets really bad knots in her hair. This brush is the only thing that has ever worked. Thank you so much. She even likes to comb her own hair now.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen P.

customer_reviews.title: HAPPILY SUPRISED
customer_reviews.text: I always skeptical of products that claim to "glide through", but this brush actually works! I have very thick kinky coily hair and this brush passes through my hair easily both wet and dry. I'd recommend this product to anyone looking for a good detangling brush. And yes, I'm leaving my denman brush for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super!  Can't be beat
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter has really curly hair. I have used the Wet Brush in the past, but this brush far exceeds it. I would recommend this brush to anyone with thick curly hair
customer_reviews.author: Grandma 2 one

customer_reviews.title: Crave Detangle Brush
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I was sceptical about the detangling brush because of the bristles. But it actually does detangle my hair. My hair is natural and long. Its a pain to detangle after washing. But this detangling brush is the best. I will order another brush for my granddaughter. You won't be disappointed, highly recommend Crave Detangle Brush.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this brush. I didn't find that it was any less painful for my 6yo, plus since the bristles are so short, I had to pull her hair up and brush it in sections because otherwise it wouldn't brush anything but the top layer of her hair, which was time consuming. It is a really awkward shape to hold when brushing someone else's hair and that it creates more static than any other brush I've ever used. Would not recommend It, and wish I hadn't wasted my money on it.
customer_reviews.author: asinclair

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed !!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush based on the reviews and after few times of using it I found that the outer bristles of the brush start bending I don’t know if this is clear in the pictures Ian attaching or not , second the length of the tbristles of brush are way too short to enter through your whole hair , I thought of getting much better product
customer_reviews.author: Sara Soliman

customer_reviews.title: Best Thing Since Sliced Bread?
customer_reviews.text: This brush is a straight up miracle. I don’t usually review products but dang. I’ve been thinking about the things I want to say to the man or woman that made this brush. My hair is (was) all sorts of a mess. I have thick coiled curls and if I put my head down on the pillow for a second, it would matt underneath. I never even thought maybe my brush was the problem? But apparently it was because I bought this randomly at 2am while I was buying all sorts of stuff on Amazon and it works so well. And it doesn’t hurt! I love this thing, I use it ALL. THE. TIME.,
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: a hard NO for me
customer_reviews.text: I did not care for this brush! It’s not at all easy to hold while brushing, especially if you have product in your hair/hands, the brush slips right out your hand because of the slippery back surface and the brush being small in size! This brush stressed me and made detangling no easier. If you have 4c hair or thicker course hair go for the BESTOOL detangling brush or a brand similar to that one! I exchanged this brush for that one and it is amazing!! It’s way easier to hold and detangles fast!
customer_reviews.author: Bry

customer_reviews.title: WHAT IS HAPPENING TO MY HEAD?!?!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned numerous detangling brushes and this was the most painful. I have no idea why there are so many good reviews. The bristles aren't really long enough to even accomplish much and since there are no soft balls on the ends of them, they feel like little needles. This is awful.
customer_reviews.author: americayay

customer_reviews.title: Harsh, rough, torturous bristles on a hard board.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for this brush for my daughter's hair, especially after reading the great reviews, but was very dissatisfied. The biggest issue is it has very rough and harsh bristles. I have very thick curly hair and it hurt me! There was no way I was trying this torture device to brush my daughter's very fine hair. The handle is very flat and extremely hard and did not fit comfortable in the hand at all. The only positive I can say is the pink color is pretty. If you want the equivalent of one of those old-fashioned metal bristled scrub brush this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Stargazinglibra

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I have long 2B curls, and this works wonderfully for detangling without causing excess breakage. I had a previous one I got at Sally beauty, and this one is just as good for roughly the same price. Eventually, the bristles will become permanently bent so it'll need to be replaced, but the bristles are the same thickness and stiffness as my previous brush, and that brush lasted for about 2 years. More than worth it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Not a magic detangler
customer_reviews.text: I have long, thick, curly hair. If I have a day where my hair is knotted beyond belief, I use this brush to start getting the tangles out. It doesn't hurt as much as a regular brush. But, I ultimately have to use a regular brush to get out the bad tangles. (I tried the curly girl method for a year and a half, no brushing. It was miserable.) Maybe on thinner hair, this would be the magic everyone else says it is but it was just average for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wannabewriter

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST for tangles! It’s way better than the Wet Brush, that is supposed to help with de-tangling wet hair. I have a daughter who, like many kids, get upset when you comb her hair after a bath and it pulls. I’ve tried so many different brushes and was thrilled to find this one!! I ended-up buying one for me too. You can comb through with one swoop and NO TEARS!! Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Olson

customer_reviews.title: Money well-spent!
customer_reviews.text: My eight-year-old niece's hair tangles like crazy, and, of course, she hates brushing her hair because it hurts. I get it, because I have long hair that tangles too. On a whim I bought this brush hoping it would help a bit--or at least that she'd want to use it more simply because it was her favorite color (pink). I tried it on my hair first and was shocked as to how well it worked. There is no pulling or pain and my hair was left feeling smooth and shiny. I can't wait to see her again so I can give her this, and I can't wait to order another one for me!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Morningstar

customer_reviews.title: 0/10 would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Worst brush ever! Never have I ever had a brush take out this much hair especially when I had leave in conditioner on!! The only way it would take out tangles was with the very tip of the brush very softly. Took me nearly 15 mins to get through my hair!!! Plus It’s not even comfortable to hold in your hand. I’m really angry and I want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Wanderlustin

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my almost 2 year old after reading several reviews from parents. She has curly, thin hair that tangles easily, and absolutely hates having her hair brushed. It took a few days for her to get used to it, but after that she does not complain about having her hair brushed! It glides right through tangles in wet or dry hair. The shape of the brush is different but not difficult to hold. Also it’s a little large for her head but works fine since she has longer hair. May not work quite as well on a younger child with shorter hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Yep, worth the hype
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about all the positive reviews and didn't want to fork over the $$ to buy it (vs cheaper options at the store), but am a believer now. My daughter's hair is fine and curly, and she wakes up every morning and nap with a rat's nest in the back of her head. This brush powers through it all in no time. Full disclosure, I started using a different conditioner for her, which also contributes to this change in brushing time. I do recommend the brush--it really has made a difference and seems like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: BoScha

customer_reviews.title: Not a good brush for quick and easy detangling
customer_reviews.text: My toddler has curly hair just like mine and it was time to graduate from the baby brush to a real brush and I thought this would be gentler than the brush I use. I typically wash her hair while I have conditioner in her hair I then brush to make it as painless as possible and to not break up her curls later. It does help her curls clump better, but it takes much longer for me to fully brush and detangle her hair and it was quite painful for her. I wish we could return this brush I will get her the flexi wet bread brush instead.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Young

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This
customer_reviews.text: This brush didn't work for me, I have somewhat wavy/curly hair that's thick so I was looking for a detangler brush. This had great reviews so I thought I'd give it a try. Pretty disappointed as it did not detangle my hair rather get stuck in it, and the size is very awkward to hold (I have super small hands as well..). I don't recommend this to anyone with thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Maia

customer_reviews.title: Miracle brush in my home. Thanks Curve
customer_reviews.text: We love this brush. I have two girl on daughter has extremely thick (did I say extremely) long wavy hair and my youngest daughter has thin, long and extremely curly hair that knots up very quickly. I had a difficult time finding a brush that she wouldn’t run away from and after many other tries of different brushes we finally found one that works successfully on both of their hair types. Thank you Curve because hair brushing once was full of chasing, and lots of crying. Now I tell her time to brush your hair and she says okay but only with my brush.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus C. Colon

customer_reviews.title: Super detangler!
customer_reviews.text: My son has incredibly long hair and I struggle endlessly to keep snarls out of it! He doesn't want to cut it, but hates having to go through the pain of brushing! This brush is a life saver!! The bristles are perfect and I can get through really tough knots super fast! The shape of the brush is nice and makes it easy to adjust to your grip as you move through and need to reach different angles. Totally recommend for anyone with long hair, but especially kids that hate hair brushing. It detangles better than any other brush we've tried.
customer_reviews.author: boo

customer_reviews.title: Not for you 4C
customer_reviews.text: This brush is not for big hands or 4C hair. I don't detangle on dry hair so gripping this brush while my hair is damp is too much trouble. I got this brush because people said it was better than the deman brush, all lies. The combs doesn't come all the way down the brush as pictured either and the bristles on it aren't sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ladysweets

customer_reviews.title: Works on all hair types
customer_reviews.text: OK so I’ve been using this type of income for a while I use my first one out to death and I ordered a second one it’s great especially for me who has for sea type hair once I get my hair really really wet and rinsed out are usually called the conditioner through or I even just call me if you know while in the shower before I add my conditioner is everything at the tangles and give me a wait it to finger eating on my hair because my curls are very very tight so this does help with loosening it
customer_reviews.author: Third times the charm

customer_reviews.title: Yay for no more brushing tears!!
customer_reviews.text: Well this was a game changer! I am so happy with this product. Brushing my three-year-old’s hair is usually a pretty dramatic nightmare, she has curly hair and if we don’t Brush it twice a day it’s a tangled mess, mornings after sleeping on it are especially hard. She let me try this brush on her for the first time today and it was also the first time there was no whining, no crying, and no tears! She told me “it hurts a tiny bit but really it doesn’t hurt that bad!”
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good, But Not Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about getting this brush. I was especially excited about it's claims to smooth the cuticles of my hair and detangle it with ease. However, while it did do this, it wasn't as effective as I thought it would be. I've used it twice now, and I must admit that it was easier for me to use the second time than the first. I have alot of hair so it's easier if I do my hair in smaller sections because the bristles are so short and soft. Overall, I like the brush and it does what I need it to do, but not worth 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Moka

customer_reviews.title: You might expect change at the dollar store
customer_reviews.text: We all hate tangles and, as many others have done, I jumped at the chance to throw ten bucks at my problem. I regret it though. It just doesn't work any better and perhaps I should not be surprised, a knot is a knot. The bristles are pointed (many brushes have balls on the end) so it is less comfortable on my daughter's scalp making a bad situation worse. I also found the brush hard to hold and very cheaply made. I've had much better quality brushes from the dollar store. All sizzle and no steak here. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Detangles, Less Shedding, Faster Drying time
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush, I have 4b/4c hair on the thicker side and it glided through my hair smooth and tangle free, didn’t have to fight with it. Defined my curls but removed a lot of product, my hair was patchy with some parts fluffing/frizzing because it was dry but I’m ok with it, will cut back on drying time which takes forever for my hair. Experienced less shedding so I’m glad about that. Don’t like the design of the brush, it’s hard to hold by the handle especially if your hands are wet and hard to hold on the sides like a tangle teezer. Takes sometime getting use to.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Roc

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have very curly hair and my son has curly/mixed hair. This brush is legit the best brush we have ever used. He is only two so it is hard to brush through his hair. I use this brush and some detangler and it works wonders. I usually have a lot of hair that is pulled out since my hair is super curly and this helps cut that down! I have tried flexible brushes, Denman etc. This is better. FYI- Not a paid review, I am just an average broke mom.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Brush!
customer_reviews.text: Because of a disorder, my hair varies in thickness and strength. This brush is the only thing that tackles both the thick and thin, easily tangled parts of my hair with ease. I found another company that offers 2-for-1 travel and regular-size brushes just like this one and snatched them up toot-sweet to keep in my car and office. If you've had bad luck with brushes and combs in the past, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Storey

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my 2 year old daughter who has fine hair, but a lot of it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old daughter who has fine hair, but a lot of it. She hated me brushing her hair, even with using nice shampoo (redken) and a detangler. I was battling her all the time to brush it. So after seeing pictures of other people that it worked for I decided why not give it a try. This brush is seriously awesome, my daughter is now brushing her hair on her own and offering to brush other people's hair. It was seriously the best thing we could of bought. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Not great for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I have really curly hair and I assumed this would work a little bit better on my hair but it literally didn’t work at all. Especially when my hair is dry. It’s comfortable to hold in my hand, but it isn’t very easy to hold when your hair is wet and the brush becomes wet too. I tried to use this brush maybe twice and then gave up. I would recommend a wet brush over this product for people with curly hair
customer_reviews.author: wnickless

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and only used it on my dry hair. I have super thick frizzy and wavy hair. I have quite long hair down to the middle of my back. This brush may not be for super thick hair because when I brushed it, it didn’t even reach my scalp and I did still see breakage but not as much as I usually see so that’s a plus. It may work better for after I wash my hair so I’ll give it one more shot.
customer_reviews.author: vmarie

customer_reviews.title: Buy this brush!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7 year old daughter whose hair does down to her butt. She gets huge knots in her hair frequently. Her hair is so beautiful but I cant spend a half an hour a day brushing it. This brush has saved me so many headaches and a lot of time. All I do is spray her hair with Johnson and Johnson detangler and then comb it. It takes less than 5 minutes now. No tears. I have two of them now. For the price you will not find something like this. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: ian

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for detangling, amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly a godsend. I absolutely love it. The only issue that I have is that I have to put product in my daughters hair to help with the detangling and having the product and touching that handle are just disastrous. We’ve almost lost the dog because it’s flown out of my hand and into the air and literally almost took Apollo out it was crazy. But maybe that’s just a one a freak accident.
customer_reviews.author: Channelling Colee

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this brush!
customer_reviews.text: Hair type: extremely fine, naturally wavy, shoulder length, prone to tangling and knotting. While I don't love this brush yet for blow drying as I still prefer my trusty vented round brush, the detangling ability really makes up for any lack. I've been putting a little leave in conditioner in while wet and then using this brush. No yanks, no pulls, no tears. I'm wishing that I had a brush like this years ago! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Winona

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: My hair is thin but does tangle at the bottom. This brush slid right through until it hit the tangled part. Then I had to hold my hair with one hand and gentle work the brush through the tangles with the other. It's almost perfect, but not quite.
customer_reviews.author: swk247

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This brush detangles great! Compared to the Wet Brush, the bristles are harder, so they will not bend or do "into" the brush like the Wet Brush over time. Because they are hard plastic, just use care when putting the brush down onto your child's head. Also, some people are complaining about the handle being too short. However, I believe that they brush is designed to be held with your handover the bulk of the brush. When you do this, it fits perfectly into the palm of your hand. The hard plastic can make it hard to hold if your hands are wet (only drawback). Otherwise, I would give it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jen_Jackson

customer_reviews.title: You’re a Wizard Harry—-
customer_reviews.text: I have fine-textured thick hair that’s about 3ft long. My hair gets HORRIBLY matted at the nape of my neck when I sleep on it [even when I braid it!] Normally—- I could spend up to half an hour trying to undo my severe matting with a normal bristle brush [which still doesn’t get the matting out it just makes it less noticable] I spent about 7 minutes of determined brushing on the MATTING and got it all out with like a 1/10 amount of pain. My normal tangles took like two, pain-free swoops and they were done lol. This brush is sorcery.
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: I would give it five stars, but oh that SLIPPERY HANDLE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this brush!!!! It makes detangling my 4B hair OH SO EASY and pain free! Massive issue: the handle is insanely slippery. I guess if you hold the back of the brush, it's find, but then why have the handle in the first place? They easily could've made the back of the handle a bit textured to make it more manageable. I don't know why they didn't.
customer_reviews.author: JournoPrincess

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for tangled hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair gets tangled so easily and I have struggled with finding a brush that can actually detangle my hair completely. This brush is so amazing and a life saver because it detangles my hair so well whether it is dry or wet! It also doesn't hurt as much when brushing in comparison to other brushes. I wish I had found this sooner!!
customer_reviews.author: Keegan

customer_reviews.title: almost as good as the wet brush
customer_reviews.text: i love the shape of this brush and it is almost as good as the wet brush which is the best brush that I have ever used on my thick curly tangled hair..this is right up there with wet brush in fact I think it has the same little bristle things except without the patented little ball on top. the one thing that this brush has over wet brush is the really cool shape. and it works great on tangles
customer_reviews.author: Confused buyer

customer_reviews.title: Detanger
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick coily/curly hair. This brush saves me a lot of time detangling my hair. Also there is a major difference I noticed with having less breakage. The only minor issue I have is the brush handle; your hand need to be dry when brushing. But on the whole this is the best brush I ever used. And it feels luxurious on my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: No way to hold this thing
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it a neon pink, no choice. I used mine for the first time today, it definitely detangles the hair if you can hold on to it. Mine was on the floor at least five times. I have to put products in my hair that makes it impossible to brush through. I have no idea why it got such high ratings, it's cheap looking and doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Helen GriffisTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Works well to gently detangle thin hair
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2 year old hates having her hair brushed because her hair tangles easily, and her scalp is very sensitive. This brush works great on her hair, she will finally let me brush it without running away. My hair is thick and it doesnt do a great job on that, but for thinner hair it's perfect. It even makes her hair look fluffier.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this cheap toy brush
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I've ever had a worse brush. It is too small and awkward to hold. This is not a one size fits all brush. If you have tiny hands or thin hair then go for it! Normally sized hands and thick hair should look elsewhere. I'm thoroughly disappointed in this waste of money. It feels very cheap and hollow like it's going to fall apart brushing through my hair. 0/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed after so many good reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Not up to the hype. It wasn’t expensive so I’m too upset but honestly it’s not it’s cracked up to be. I feel like it’s no better at kids tangled hair than any other brush.
customer_reviews.author: nevershelly77

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't pull your hair out!
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit difficult for me to hold because of rheumatoid arthritis, but when I get a good grip, it's excellent. I used it on my granddaughter and it didn't pul until it found a nasty bunch of knotty hair. I had to use a detangler spray. It's good for an adult's tangled hair but if your 5 yr old gets nasty knots, perhaps the detangler is all you need.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend! Toddler approves😊
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old’s curly hair that is a tangle magnet. She would cry when I brushed her hair. She lets me brush her hair now and even “brushed” her stuffed animals’s hair lol. Tonight, she even let me sit down and brush her hair for a few minutes which has NEVER happened before!!! I highly recommend this brush and I will be recommending this to people with special needs children who have meltdowns when brushing their hair.
customer_reviews.author: Purple diamond

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: Did I miss something here? I read a list of “loved products” recommended by many people on this brush. I was excited about to no pain detangling part so I got it. It’s horrible! It’s bristles actually hurt my neck and scalp & it certainly does not “detangle” as it indicates on the box. What a waste of money! Don’t buy this! The Wetbrush is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa himango

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt snag like the denman brush :)
customer_reviews.text: It actually works fir my daughter's thick curly/coily hair. I was using a denman brush before but problem was it kept snagging her hair. Well, thats not gonna work. So I decided to try this one and honestly expected to have the same issue with snagging but to my surprise it does not snag her hair like the denman brush did.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Hadn't Bought It
customer_reviews.text: This brush was just ok. It didn't glide through my daughter's hair like I expected. She has thick hair with a slight wave, so nothing crazy, but it still pulls and yanks at her hair a fair amount. I use my other detangling brushes rather than this one, since it takes more effort to get through all her hair with this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous brush, no more hair pulling.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my daughter, I've bought her several different ones and ALL of them have been disappointing until now. The others would pull her hair, the tips of the bristles or the entire bristle would come off, when the rounded top over the bristles came off then it would hurt her scalp. This one doesn't have those hard bristles with the tips being covered, so no worries on that part. It didn't pull her hair, and the shape is ergonomically perfect for better grip. Works well with either wet or dry hair. I ordered one for me, and now my boys and husband want one too to replace theirs. We all used her brush and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Landis

customer_reviews.title: My daughter won't use another hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and myself had a hard time brushing her hair when it was wet with other brushes, even when she used conditioner to detangle it. Ever since we got this, she won't use another brush. It does a much better job than your typical brush at working through the tangles without hurting her. Thus, it takes her less time as well when brushing her hair since it's more efficient. I don't really have anything negative to say about this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Carfo

customer_reviews.title: Believe The Hype
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I thought I already owned a detangling brush...boy was I wrong. This brush is way better than anything I've every used. For those that feel like they lose a ton of hair when detangling, this is for you. I had barely any hair come off onto the brush! No pulling and knots were easily and gently taken care of. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: T G

customer_reviews.title: Don't fall for it!
customer_reviews.text: I have never hated a brush more than this. Ever. You'd be better off combing your hair with a fork. I have medium-long hair that is wavy or straight depending on styling and even when styled smooth or conditioned this thing is ripping and breaking hair. And forget about it if you're actually trying to detangle. It is NOT well designed to fit in any normal sized hand. Cheap piece of crap. Just don't do it. Any other brush will do.
customer_reviews.author: Miss_Grad

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is wonderful for detangling. I'm African American with different textures of hair. This brush handles it all. I'm having problems using my prominent hand. This brush fits my hand nicely allowing me to groom my hair to my satisfaction. Brissels are substantial while not being too hard or painful. You will love this brush. And its cure too!
customer_reviews.author: Greta D. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it feels like it’s not getting all the way in there you ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I’m not giving it five stars is because I wish the bristles were longer. Sometimes it feels like the bristles are only combing teh top of my hair vs getting all the way in there you know? Aside from that it’s amazing to just keep this in the shower when you have curly hair like myself, brush and be on your way!
customer_reviews.author: Tbah

customer_reviews.title: It does Detangle!
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of this brush. It fits well and comfortably in my hand. It's a natural design and curves just right when brushing my hair. However, it is made of a very lightweight, hollow plastic. The bristles are a bit short and are also made of plastic. I realize it is a great price for the materials, but it is low quality. The plastic is going to self-destruct sooner than later with the bristles already separating from the handle in one spot. I prefer and am looking for a wood and/or other natural materials for this model.
customer_reviews.author: Tina_Says!

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine kids hair
customer_reviews.text: This is a good brush for detangling. My daughter who is 5 has very fine hair but it is on the thick side and curly. We had been using the Wet brush, this works better for her. The only drawback is that it sometimes doesn't reach tangles underneath. I brush the top layer and then turn the brush and brush the under layer. I do wish the brush had a bit more weight to it. It feels flimsy but gets the job done as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: redjen910

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this brush to detangle my five-year-old daughter's hair, she has large curls and thin hair that tangles easily. I use a Denman brush to detangle my own hair in the shower but it wasn't proving effective on her. Initially, I used the brush on her dry hair without too much success but found that using it whenever I wash her hair has made the detangling process that much easier on both of us. She used to cry and complain whenever I had to untangle her hair and now she barely notices that I'm working the knots out.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Tee

customer_reviews.title: Eh. What's the hype?- I lied! Lol
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: After months of use, this brush really does wonders. I have less hair loss and the detangling is far less painful. My hair seems to be less frizzy and minimally giving me split ends.. I've changed up a few things about my routine but this stuck! I dont really understand the hype, the detangling isnt "fantastic or amazing" it's a brush, it works better than your dollar store brush but I didnt see such detangling that made me go WOW! I guess i didnt have too much hair fall out but it has been only my 2nd time using it. Might update review later.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Hurts more than a normal brush
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brush to get rid of tangles in my girls hair because they always complain how much a normal brush hurts their head. However, all of my girls state that this hurts way more than a normal brush, and I don't see any difference in how quickly tangles are removed using this compared to a much cheaper brush.
customer_reviews.author: Braedon Goudie

customer_reviews.title: Detangles softly
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t write reviews on products but this one I had to. I have very curly hair and recently went from dark brown to Balyaj, for the first time adding a lot of blondes to my hair I didn’t realize how much the texture of my hair would change a bit. And with my normal conair square shape brush my hair was extra tangled and took a lot more time to de tangle after the shower and chunks and chunks would rip out from trying to brush out the knots. This brush didn’t hurt when brushing my hair out and softly detangled my knots. Love this product would definitely purchase a spare to keep around.
customer_reviews.author: ursula ann cuellar

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, the reviews sold me, but the product did not.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Seller saw my review and issued an unsolicited full refund with kind words. As a result, I am changing my review to three stars: the brush did not work for me, but the customer service did! I bought this based on all the positive reviews, and am puzzled by them. The item did not work for me in the slightest. I have thick, fine hair, and all it did was pull some out, but not lessen the tangles at all.
customer_reviews.author: K. Springer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome detangler
customer_reviews.text: This detangles my 5yo kids hair super quick with less pain than most other brushes I've used on her. I'm a single dad and it makes my nights after bath and mornings quick. I can get her crazy morning hair under control, put on a little product, brush that through and out we go in just a few minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Better than a regular brush, but the bristles are made of a slightly tacky rubber-like material. My other detangling brush is super smooth plastic and much better. I also find this really weird to hold. I think it's more focused on trying to look unique than being the best at its job :(.
customer_reviews.author: AircrewUp

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!Yes,this is the brush i was searching for her curls.I have straight hair and i was in trouble with my baby's super curly hair.She is finally not crying when i brush her hair.I am super happy and would definitely recommend.My baby is 9 months old and since she was born was difficult to handle her hair.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item for a Dads toddler.
customer_reviews.text: Just buy this brush now if you or your little girl has super curly hair. I used to have trouble figuring out how to make hair time fun and quick with no pulling or pain for her. This brush makes hair time quick and leaves her hair full and fluffy with no pulling or pain. I can not recommend this enough!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good for natural hair.
customer_reviews.text: This has been an amazing addition to my wash day routine. I have natural, type 4 hair. It guides through my hair with ease. The only hang up is that I find it difficult to hold by the handle. Otherwise awesome! I’ll update my review once I’ve had a chance to use it on my hair when dry. Update: 7/6/19 It worked okay when preparing to wash. However I feel that it works best for my type 4 hair when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I don't even know where to start. Brushing my daughters hair has been hell, it's very curly and knots very easily so brushing it dry was no fun for her or me and would take 30 minutes at least! But this brush worked amazing. I don't think I've seen her hair this smooth while dry in over a year and it took me less than 5 minutes. I'm so glad I purchased this!! I'm even hinking of buying one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Sovey

customer_reviews.title: So gentle for unmanageable hair.
customer_reviews.text: I have super long hair (like down to my butt lol) and it is SO HARD TO MAINTAIN! I used to spend like 15-20 minutes before my shower combing and de-tangling my hair but then this brush came along! The bristles dont look super long, so when i got it i was skeptical because i have so much hair, but it was able to get through it all and de-tangle it with out tearing my hair! My hair has less breakage and takes so much less time to brush it now!
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Makes brushing tangles easier
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother and she loves it. I would describe her hair texture as 3c/4a, if it helps. It makes her hair easier to detangle. The shape of the handle is a little cumbersome but it's nice overall. To help with cleaning, all you have to do is place the brush under running water with shampoo and a rat-tailed comb.
customer_reviews.author: Jäe P.

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: You need this, so just buy it already. I've been on the hunt for a brush that will help detangle my daughters thick, extremely curly hair without causing her pain or breakage. WELL I FOUND IT! Usually I spend 20+ minutes just brushing her hair, with this I had her hair done in under 2 minutes without a single complaint and she said "mom, did you already do my hair?". This brush also works for my wavy, medium thickness hair
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: This brush is life changing!
customer_reviews.text: I have very thin hair that tangles frequency. This brush changed my life and made it possible to actually brush through my hair. I am amazed at how well it works and how much better brushing my wet hair has become! I would highly recommend this product for any one that has this same issue. This brush will help!
customer_reviews.author: Beth A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Came as advertised and when they said it would be delivered. I ordered a second one for travel. It takes out the tangles so well even with my hair wet and gets into the hair at the base of my neck where my hair snarls. I notice that I am shedding less hair when I brush out my hair after my shower with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glides through curly hair
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was no different than any other brush, then I had a child with curly hair instead of straight hair. It glides through her unruly curls whereas other brushes would get caught. It does a good job of getting tangles out of both straight hair and curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Allison P

customer_reviews.title: Genius product, it stands by its claims
customer_reviews.text: This is, hands down, a great product. I was skeptical about the effectiveness of their claims.... lo and behold, it works great. My long and straight hear is now easy to handle. Any nod is easy to tame.... all that in a fraction of time than before. You still need to handle your hair with care when brushing but, it is not anymore an impossible and long task.
customer_reviews.author: Ana B

customer_reviews.title: left wanting more ease of brushing of hair!
customer_reviews.text: This brush was rated the 'best of the best' When brushing hair, it has to be completely wet for this brush to work. It works minimally on dry hair. The brush is also very cumbersome to hold as the handle is quite small. If I would have known what I know now I would not have purchased this brush. My daughter has hair down to her waist that is extremely thick, we go through at least one bottle of detangler spray a week that's at a bare minimum. I am now in search of a brush that I can use when her hair is either wet from a shower/bath/swimming etc. etc. or completely dry.
customer_reviews.author: kasey hadd

customer_reviews.title: Deserves its High Ratings
customer_reviews.text: This brush definitely deserves all the high ratings it has. It's cheap, easy to hold, use, and it gets the job done so well. I questioned it a little bit because it's so cheap, but I'm a believer now. It's fantastic and I recommend it for anybody in need of a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Hard bristles hurt a bit.
customer_reviews.text: My sister had a brush similar so I tried for this one since I don’t know the brand she originally bought. It’s a nice product and it does detangle, however it is not for someone tender headed. My sister’s brush had soft bristles and it glided through the hair. This brush’s bristles are hard and it hurts a bit. Not the best for someone who has tangles in their hair, which is a huge part of why I bought it. I wouldn’t recommend for someone looking for a detangling brush.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, best brush for tangled hair
customer_reviews.text: I have really long, really thick, naturally curly hair and I used to DREAD the washing/deep conditioning and the comb out of my hair. It literally takes me 30 minutes to de-tangle it with tons of conditioner. I ordered this brush out of desperation in my last ditch attempt to save myself some time and effort. IT is a freaking miracle. The brush went right thru my hair, no pulling, no pain, no more tangled hair. It works on both wet and dry hair. I wish to god I had thought about changing my brush years ago. It is amazing and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush to Rid Hair of Tangles Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have bought this years ago because it is wonderful! I have always had thick curly tangled hair that takes 30 minutes of detangling with tugging and discomfort. This brush goes right through like I don’t have any tangles with in minutes and feels great as it massages my scalp. I can actually brush it dry or wet and it dries my hair quick and it shines without frizz. No hair pulled out when I am done. Thanks for your product!
customer_reviews.author: catherine pence

customer_reviews.title: It neither detangled nor kept tears away.
customer_reviews.text: It neither detangled nor kept tears away. It might work if your hair is already mostly detangled like 90% detangled but then whats the point in buying a detangling brush. I gave it to my sister who's hair is already detangled and has no crying children. FYI my children have coarse hair when dry and soft when wet. It did not work on dry or wet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: I have very straight and fine hair that always gets tangled. I used this brush and was actually shocked that I was able to not only brush my hair without pulling out handfuls of hair but I was also able to flip my head over and brush that way too with easy. I could never flip my hair over and brush through it. I haven’t tried it on wet hair or for drying. So all in all, good brush.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah C

customer_reviews.title: Child's play
customer_reviews.text: I have long straight hair that tangles easily. This product is lightweight and does not go through my hair. I have tried it on both wet and dry hair and the thin bristles just bend and do not detangle anything. I suspect it would work on fine baby hair, but this product is not suitable for somebody with a full head of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Campbell

customer_reviews.title: I've recommended to friends and I'm thinking about purchasing a second ...
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick and curly hair (long). On a daily basis my brush or comb gets tangled and I end up ripping it out of my hair. Every morning my husband will hear "ouch" several times during the process. I've even contemplated cutting my hair lately but thought I would give this brush a try. Curly hair ladies... Purchase now. Life changing. I threw out my other brushes. This is my go to. I've recommended to friends and I'm thinking about purchasing a second as a backup!! The company is great with communication and followed up by email to see if I had questions. I would highly recommend this brush and seller!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Life saving
customer_reviews.text: Best detangler brush for curly wavy or straight hair. Fine corse thick thin and everything in between it works great. Takes me lest then 5 mins now to brush through each of my girls hair and no one is crying when we are done. Definitely a life saver for anyone especially mommies
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nekvasil

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily but I still love it
customer_reviews.text: I have dense type 4b/c hair and I use this brush to detangle when styling. Love it for that. It works beautifully on my hair and my client's 3b hair. The o n l y thing is this brush just falls apart when you drop it. It just pops back into place but this can be frustrating when your hands are slick with leave in and you're picking up the brush for the 548734th time. ALSO This is not a firm brush,it's slightly flexible which I like for more fine detangling.
customer_reviews.author: Ummsamiyah

customer_reviews.title: This brush actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical when I bought this brush, wondering if it was really going to work on super curly, easy to get tangled hair. It has exceeded my expectations and I can't believe how awesome it actually works. This is great for thick, curly, hard to untangle hair. It doesn't get caught in the snarls and it is so easy to brush hair now.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber Burks

customer_reviews.title: Not for super thick hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have thick curly hair and this brush does not help me detangle it. I have to use a comb as well. I had gotten a brush similar to this from Ulta that worked wayyy better but haven't been out as much due to Covid and thought I could just grab one here on Amazon. nope
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Seran

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny!!! Gets all of the tangles out of my 5 year old’s crazy hair. She doesn’t cry, she brushes on her own now and can’t get enough of this! Its bristles are so soft and the brush is easy to hold for even tiny hands (our 2 year old uses it and loves it too).
customer_reviews.author: Devan Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: The perfect brush for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: This brush has changed the way my curls set. I have type 3 ringlet curls, but if I use the wrong brush my curls look flat and sad. I absolutely love it, I use it in the shower to detangle while I condition, and I use it out of the shower when I’m applying products.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Even better then described
customer_reviews.text: I can’t stop brushing my hair. I usually have to spend 30 minutes twice a day just to brush my hair, god forbid if I used hairspray I’d have to spend 45 minutes in the shower brushing with conditioner. I have baby fine thick hair and this within minutes had my hair tangle free (with hairspray). I have way more volume and my hair is the softest I’ve ever felt. Used it 5 times already and have no hair left in the brush from breakage. It’s actually fun to brush my hair now and I’m no longer afraid to brush and style it with product.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Brush your hair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new brush as every 13 year old girl is excited about getting new items for their hair. She reports that it goes through her hair which is naturally thick with some curl easily. It does produce static when brushing her hair. It goes through snaggles easily without much pulling. She is very happy with this new brush. Her hair looks well taken care of and shiny after she has brushed it with this brush. It works great, no complaints here. I reviewed this product because I chose too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer MacCormick

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I have fine/thick hair. I heard good things about this style brush and was drawn to it because having the water get trapped in a typical brush freaks me out and seems germy. This de-tangles my hair perfectly and doesn't create nots. Got it for gifts as well. Got it for my friend and her husband uses it too.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is actually amazing. I have long, thick curly hair and I was able to brush my hair (while wet) with no issues. I was previously using the Wet brush and I ended up brushing the same spot for 20 minutes. This brush fits perfectly in my hand and there's very minimal hair coming out when I use it. I would definitely recommend it if you have thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Great Detangler!  Difficult to hold!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an Amazing Detangling Brush! Works like a breeze! I have extremely long and curly hair, which at age 60 is becoming harder to manage. BUT... this brush really makes removing tangles simple; but... the brush for someone like me (arthritic hands), is difficult to keep a firm grip. Also, suggestion to the manufacturer...maybe design a brush with a longer stem or handle. But for all those with unmanageable tangles after washing, this is (along with a special leave in detangling spray or lotion), is a godsend!
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Works surprisingly well!
customer_reviews.text: Great for detangling hair with my 2 year olds short curly hair. Usually I spend some time trying to unknot the ends of my daughters hair, by using a comb. This brush works so great that there's no knots left at the end of her hair like before with the comb I was using. This was a filler item I purchased spur of the moment and thought what the heck, I'll try it. Not giving it 5 stars bc I find the shape a little hard to hold, especially if my hands are slick from products I'm using in her hair. Also the brush is extremely cheap in materials. Made of plastic and lightweight but surprisingly works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Buy this NOW if you have a daughter!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brush my 5 year old will use!!! Post bath time and early mornings used to be a nightmare with screams and tears trying to brush her tangled hair (she wouldn't let us do it anymore because regular brushed hurt when they pulled) but now she's happy throughout the whole process and hair gets brushed smooth! LIFESAVER.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon3Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Glides through wet or dry hair
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this brush. I have long curly hair and this is the only brush/comb that does not get stuck in my hair or pull out hair from my scalp. Wet or dry this is the way to go. Threw out all my other brushes and wide toothed combs. I highly recommend this item. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie D

product_meta.title: Crave Naturals Glide Thru Detangling Brush for Adults & Kids Hair - Detangler Comb & Hair Brush for Natural, Curly, Straight, Wet or Dry Hair (PINK)
feature_bullets: ORIGINAL GLIDE THRU BRUSH - Ever since the Glide Thru Detangling Brush launched, other companies have tried to copy it! But only the Glide Thru Detangling Brush has firm, quality bristles that will not lose their shape!

THE BEST AT REMOVING KNOTS AND TANGLES – Ordinary bristle brushes work against the hair, basically ripping through and pulling out the knotted hair instead of gently separating it! But the unique cone shaped plastic bristles work to separate the hair sideways instead of down, gently unraveling even the toughest tangles.

CHILD FRIENDLY – No more fits when it's time to get ready to go out! The Glide Thru brush doesn't dig into the scalp or rip out hair like other brushes. It takes out tangles without yanking or hurting and can easily be held in your palm. One customer review states, "My daughter used to cry every time Mommy brushed her hair. This brush is the best thing I ever bought for her."

GENTLE ON WET OR DRY HAIR – Other brushes have beads at the end that can dig into the scalp and get caught in tangles causing pain and breakage. The Glide Thru brush has painless soft plastic bristles that massage the scalp and increase circulation, which may help increase hair growth. One customer writes: "I brushed my hair for at least 2 or 3 minutes because it felt so good." It also smoothes the cuticle layer, making your hair shine!

WORKS ON VARIOUS HAIR TYPES - Designed to be used on wet or dry hair, this brush easily removes every knot and tangle. Can be used on straight, curly, natural, thin, thick, kinky, coily, frizzy, extensions and even wigs.
